Package fr.univtours.polytech.ptjavapointeuse.common

Class TCPBuffer

java.lang.Object
fr.univtours.polytech.ptjavapointeuse.common.TCPBuffer
Direct Known Subclasses:
TCPMessage
class TCPBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
Preparation of the buffer class for the TCPMessage class!

    • fillChar

      protected void fillChar​(java.lang.String msOut)
      Fill the buffer if the message we want to send (in this case, an ID with the date and the rounded time of the current time)
      Parameters:
      msOut - The message that we want to transfer to the Central Application.

    • clearBuffer

      void clearBuffer()
      Take out every character inside a buffer (by replacing every of them by a 0).

    • count

      protected int count()
      To have the number of characters in the buffer.
      Returns:
      the number of characters inside the buffer, ready to be sent to the Central Application.
